content.raw: I’ve modified camera angles of `SSCI_X2`  platform and recorded `PointCloud2` messages from stationary robot in starting area to ROS bag. I’m going to submit a custom robot configuration in a week or two and we can revisit this issue then, since I’m not confident in being able to switch between original and modified `SSCI_X2`  configurations.
content.html: I’ve modified camera angles of SSCI_X2 platform and recorded PointCloud2 messages from stationary robot in starting area to ROS bag. I’m going to submit a custom robot configuration in a week or two and we can revisit this issue then, since I’m not confident in being able to switch between original and modified SSCI_X2 configurations.
